mod.name: 100% Spire Juice
mod.credits:
Art Assets - Orange_Juice and Fruitbat Factory
BaseMod, ModTheSpire, and StSLib - Bug Kiooeht
StSDefaultModBase - Gremious
Beta Testing - Spookalon, Skyson, Fenec250, Reina
Character Animation Assistance - Darkglade
Misc. Coding Assistance - Gk, Jobby, Kio, Darkglade, Jedi, Alchyr, Vex, Teafling, and many more from #modding-technical in general
Simplified Chinese Translation - Anonymous User
Korean Translation - Tsurumaki Maki
mod.description:
Adds Star Breaker from 100% Orange Juice. 

Including 80+ cards and 0% original art!

cards.name: Ambush
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Then deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Ambush+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Then deal 7 damage.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Long-Distance Shot
cards.description:
Deal 3 moonworks:Piercing *Damage.
Draw this card whenever you gain a *Norma level.

cards.name: Long-Distance Shot+
cards.description:
Deal 5 moonworks:Piercing *Damage.
Draw this card whenever you gain a *Norma level.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Air Strike
cards.description:
Deal 20 moonworks:Splash *Damage to ALL enemies.
Purge.

cards.name: Air Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 30 moonworks:Splash *Damage to ALL enemies.
Purge.

cards.name: Big Rocket Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 10 moonworks:Splash *Damage.
Shuffle 1 *Air *Strike into your draw pile.
Purge.

cards.name: Big Rocket Cannon+
cards.description:
Deal 16 moonworks:Splash *Damage.
Shuffle 1 *Air *Strike into your draw pile.
Purge.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Execution
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.
Purge.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Execution+
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.
Purge.

cards.name: Leap Through Time
cards.description:
Rewind your personal timeline to when your moonworks:Temporal_Anchor was created.
Each turn, moonworks:Divergence increases by 15 until this card is played.

cards.name: Leap Through Time+
cards.description:
Rewind your personal timeline to when your moonworks:Temporal_Anchor was created.
Each turn, moonworks:Divergence increases by 10 until this card is played.

cards.name: Magical Inferno
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies for EACH alive enemy.
Purge.

cards.name: Magical Inferno+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies for EACH alive enemy.
Purge.

cards.name: Magical Massacre
cards.description:
Remove 25 % of the target's total HP.
Purge.

cards.name: Magical Massacre+
cards.description:
Remove 33 % of the target's total HP.
Purge.

cards.name: Magical Revenge
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to your missing HP.
Heal for 33 % the damage dealt.
Purge.

cards.name: Magical Revenge+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to your missing HP.
Heal for 50 % the damage dealt.
Purge.

cards.name: Star Blasting Light
cards.description:
Apply 3 to 5 moonworks:Blasting_Light to ALL enemies.
Purge.

cards.name: Star Blasting Light+
cards.description:
Apply 4 to 7 moonworks:Blasting_Light to ALL enemies.
Purge.

cards.name: Assault
cards.description:
Deal 7 moonworks:Fixed damage.
This Attack ignores Block.

cards.name: Assault+
cards.description:
Deal 9 moonworks:Fixed damage.
This Attack ignores Block.

cards.name: Big Magnum
cards.description:
Lose 5 HP.
Gain 7 Vigor.
Gain 0 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bigger Magnum
cards.description:
Lose 6 HP.
Gain 10 Vigor.
Gain 1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cloud of Seagulls
cards.description:
Deal 2 moonworks:Fixed damage to a random target 2 times.
Shuffle 1 *Jonathan *Rush into your draw pile.

cards.name: Cloud of Seagulls+
cards.description:
Deal 2 moonworks:Fixed damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Shuffle 1 *Jonathan *Rush+ into your draw pile.

cards.name: Deploy Bits
cards.description: Gain a total of 10 randomly distributed Block and Vigor.

cards.name: Deploy Bits+
cards.description: Gain a total of 14 randomly distributed Block and Vigor.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Preparation
cards.description: Shuffle 3 *Evil *Spy *Work *Execution into your draw pile.

cards.name: Evil Spy Work Preparation+
cards.description: Shuffle 4 *Evil *Spy *Work *Execution into your draw pile.

cards.name: I'm On Fire!
cards.description: Gain 10 Vigor and 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: I'm On Fire!+
cards.description: Gain 14 Vigor and 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Indiscriminate Fire
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies X times.
Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Indiscriminate Fire+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies X times.
Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Jonathan Rush
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Increase the damage of ALL *Jonathan *Rush cards this combat by 2.

cards.name: Jonathan Rush+
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Increase the damage of ALL *Jonathan *Rush cards this combat by 3.

cards.name: Lulu's Lucky Egg
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Trigger 1 of 3 effects:
Draw 2 cards.
Block is 2 times stronger.
Gain 2 temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Lulu's Lucky Egg+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Trigger 1 of 3 effects:
Draw 3 cards.
Block is 3 times stronger.
Gain 3 temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Nice Present
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nice Present+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Saki's Cookie
cards.description:
Trigger 1 of 3 effects:
Heal 2 HP.
Gain 3 Vigor.
Gain 3 moonworks:Steady.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Saki's Cookie+
cards.description:
Trigger 1 of 3 effects:
Heal 3 HP.
Gain 5 Vigor.
Gain 5 moonworks:Steady.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Angel Hand
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 10 Block.
On retain, this card changes into *Devil *Hand.

cards.name: Angel Hand+
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 14 Block.
On retain, this card changes into *Devil *Hand.

cards.name: Awakening Of Talent
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Gain 7 Block.
Draw 1 card.
If this kills an enemy, gain [E].

cards.name: Awakening Of Talent+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain 10 Block.
Draw 1 card.
If this kills an enemy, gain [E].

cards.name: Backdoor Trade
cards.description:
Raise your *Norma level by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Backdoor Trade+
cards.description:
Raise your *Norma level by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Beyond Hell
cards.description:
Gain 2 Vigor for every 5 missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Beyond Hell+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Vigor for every 5 missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Big Bang Bell
cards.description:
The next time this target does not intend to attack, deal 10 damage.
This damage exponentially increases every turn.

cards.name: Big Bang Bell+
cards.description:
The next time this target does not intend to attack, deal 15 damage.
This damage exponentially increases every turn.

cards.name: Binding Chains
cards.description:
Target loses 8 Strength this turn. moonworks:Splash.
Decrease this card's effect by 4 this combat.

cards.name: Binding Chains+
cards.description:
Target loses 12 Strength this turn. moonworks:Splash.
Decrease this card's effect by 4 this combat.

cards.name: Bloodlust
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 7.
In Hand: Take 4 damage at the beginning of your turn, but for each Attack played heal 2 HP.
On Play: Discard.

cards.name: Bloodlust+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 10.
In Hand: Take 4 damage at the beginning of your turn, but for each Attack played heal 2 HP.
On Play: Discard.

cards.name: Cast Off
cards.description:
Lose all Block.
Gain Vigor equal to the amount of Block lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cast Off+
cards.description:
Lose all Block.
Gain Vigor equal to the amount of Block lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Completion Reward
cards.description:
Deals damage for every card played this combat. moonworks:Reset.
(Deals 0 damage.)

cards.name: Completion Reward+
cards.description:
Deals damage for every card played this combat. Half moonworks:Reset.
(Deals 0 damage.)

cards.name: Cooking Time
cards.description:
Everyone heals 3 HP. Deals damage equal to the amount healed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cooking Time+
cards.description:
Everyone heals 5 HP. Deals damage equal to the amount healed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dash!
cards.description:
Gain [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dash!+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Exhaust.

Retain.

cards.name: Devil Hand+

Retain.
Deal 14 damage.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Extended Photon Rifle+

cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If the enemy has Vulnerable, deal 12 damage again.

cards.name: Final Surgery+

If the enemy has Vulnerable, deal 16 damage again.

cards.name: Flamethrower
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 12.

On Play: Discard.

cards.name: Flamethrower+

moonworks:Gift_Uses 12.
In Hand: Upon playing a card, deal 3 moonworks:Fixed damage to an enemy.

cards.description:

cards.name: Heat 300%+
cards.description: Remove all Block the next time it is gained.

cards.name: Intelligence Officer+

Attack: Gain 3 Vigor.
Skill: Gain 3 moonworks:Steady.
Other: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Lucky Charm
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.
In Hand: Gain [E] at the beginning of your turn.
On Play: Discard and use up to 3 [E] to regain moonworks:Gift_Uses.

cards.name: Lucky Charm+
cards.description:
moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.
In Hand: Gain [E] at the beginning of your turn.
On Play: Discard and use up to 3 [E] to regain moonworks:Gift_Uses.

cards.name: Miracle Walker

cards.name: Miracle Walker+
cards.description:
Each time this card transforms, it costs 0 that turn.

cards.name: Poppoformation+

cards.name: Raging Madness+

Innate.
Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain 1 Strength.

moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.

cards.name: Red Bean Ice Cream+

moonworks:Gift_Uses 3.

cards.name: Reproduction of Records+
cards.description:
Retain.

cards.name: Scrambled Eve+

cards.description:
Retain.
End your turn.

In Hand: *Saki's *Cookies gain +2 to their effect and moonworks:Auto_Consume when drawn.

In Hand: *Saki's *Cookies gain +2 to their effect and moonworks:Auto_Consume when drawn.

cards.name: Tactical Retreat+

Once per turn, the next time you damage this target, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Treasure Thief+

Once per turn, the next time you damage this target, draw 1 card.

cards.description:

cards.name: Unpaid Work+
cards.description:
The next card you play which does not purge and costs more than 0 will refund it's cost.
Exhaust.

moonworks:Gift_Uses 4.

cards.name: x1 Big Rocket
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage. Increase this card's damage by 6 this combat.

cards.name: x2 Big Rocket
cards.description:

cards.name: Accel Hyper
cards.description:
This turn, your next Attack and Skill are played twice.

cards.name: Accel Hyper+
cards.description: This turn, your next Attack and Skill are played twice.

cards.name: Accelerator
cards.description: Whenever a card is created in combat, create an additional copy of it. Has *exceptions.

cards.description: Gain X Strength and 5X Block.

Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Encore+
cards.description: The last card you play each turn has it's *effect repeated at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Out Of Ammo+
cards.description: Whenever you have either no cards, or only moonworks:Gift and Unplayable Status cards, in your hand during your turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Sink Or Swim+
cards.description:

cards.name: Star Blasting Fuse+

Apply moonworks:Invisible_Bomb.

Move that card to your hand and put this card where it was.

cards.name: Subspace Tunnel+
cards.description:
Choose a card in any pile.
Move that card to your hand and put this card where it was.

cards.name: We Are Waruda+

Remove all debuffs from ALL targets.

relics.name: Broken Bomb
relics.description: Every 10th Skill you play raises your moonworks:Norma by 1 and adds 1 Star Blasting Light to your hand.

relics.name: Homemark
relics.description: Start every combat with Norma 0. Right click when out of combat to spend 120 Gold to permanently raise this effect, up to a maximum of 5.
relics.flavorText: It tastes like orange juice. Strange.

relics.name: Little Gull
relics.description: At the beginning of your turn, and every time you play a Jonathan Rush or Cloud of Seagulls, deal 2 to 7 damage to a random enemy.

relics.name: Warp Panel
relics.description: Divergence will no longer stack higher than 80.

relics.name: SB Bomb
relics.description: Every 12th card you play raises your moonworks:Norma by 1 and adds 1 Star Blasting Light to your hand.

relics.name: Golden Die
relics.description: Increase the Uses of your positive Gift cards by 50%.
relics.flavorText: Sadly, unable to roll zeros or sevens.

potions.name: 100% Orange Juice
potions.description: Achieve Norma 6. Receive incredible power that you cannot safely contain.

keywords.name: Auto Consume
keywords.description: The card's effect is automatically activated and the card is immediately purged. This does not count as playing the card.

keywords.name: Auto Effect
keywords.description: This effect is automatically activated and does not count as playing the card.

keywords.name: Blast Off!
keywords.description: Increases by the amount of damage received. At the start of your next turn, the target loses Blastoff and takes damage equal to it's amount

keywords.name: Blasting Light
keywords.description: Blasted creatures lose both HP and Max HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, the blast worsens, but the worse the blast is the more likely it is to wear off.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Degraded
keywords.description: This card's base damage and block values are reduced by up to 3 each time it is drawn. The base values will not reduce lower than 1.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Divergence
keywords.description:
Divergence from the main timeline results in things not going back exactly the way you remembered them.
Attempting to Leap with high Divergence may result in permanent unwanted effects.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Fixed
keywords.description: This card is affected by Plushie Mark and Buffer, but unaffected by Strength, Dexterity, Weak, Frail, Vulnerable, and most other powers.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Fragile
keywords.description: This card has a 1 in 3 chance of automatically exhausting when drawn.

keywords.name: Free Draw
keywords.description: If you do not draw this card at the start of combat, add it to your hand.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Gift
keywords.description: This card's primary effects are active while in your hand. A Gift may also have an additional effects with triggers.

keywords.name: Gift Uses
keywords.description: Gift cards Retain while they have uses, and immediately Exhaust when they are out. One use is consumed when a Gift card's primary effect triggers.

keywords.name: Invisible Bomb
keywords.description: Causes the target to lose HP each time a Star Blasting Fuse is drawn.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Norma
keywords.description: Cards may have listed bonus effects at specific Norma levels.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Optimized
keywords.description: This card gives only as much Block as needed, determined by your current block and the intent of your enemies. The remaining amount will be given as Vigor.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Piercing
keywords.description: If this Attack damages the enemy's Block, they lose an equal amount of HP.

keywords.name: Plushie Mark
keywords.description:
If a target with a mark is hit for...
6 or less damage: Raise the damage to 7 and Pierce.
7 or more damage: Gain 3 temporary HP.
One mark then consumed.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Reduced
keywords.description: This card's base values are lowered by 1.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Reset
keywords.description: This card resets its conditional effect when played.

keywords.name: Shield Counter
keywords.description:
Any attack you fully block is reflected onto the attacker.
If you still have Block at the end of the turn and rollover is applied, you do not lose Shield Counter.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Special
keywords.description: This card can not be obtained from normal card-drops.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Splash
keywords.description: The primary target takes the full effect. ALL OTHER targets take half the amount.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Steady
keywords.description: Gain more Block the next time a Block gaining card is played.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Stunned
keywords.description: A stunned target does nothing this turn.

keywords.name: Temporal Anchor
keywords.description:
Your Temporal Anchor allows you to rewind your personal state to when it was created. All other entities are unaffected.
A Temporal Anchor will undergo Divergence the longer you take between creating it and rewinding to it.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Transformative
keywords.description: This card Transforms when drawn or retained.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Trap
keywords.description: This card's effect ignores Artifact.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Voiding
keywords.description: Lose 1 energy when you draw this card.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Wanted
keywords.description:
This turn, the Wanted enemy becomes the target of all attacks and negative effects.
The Wanted enemy will not injure itself by default.

keywords.name: Moonworks:Withering
keywords.description: This card immediately exhausts, regardless of where it is.

keywords.name: Moonworks:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
